Bluetooth headphone with universal connectivity with all iOS, Android,Windows and Mac devices.

【THE HI-FI AUDIO YOU SHOULD HEAR】- Over-ear headphones with one of the best upgraded dynamic audio speakers. Technology that adapts with the music genre in order to deliver immersive audio experience. So powerful crisp sound with deep bass would make you forget about any other wireless or wired headphone you have used before.

【PREMIUM OVER EAR LIGHTWEIGHT DESIGN】- Quality you will love from the first touch. Bluetooth headphones built with the highest quality and premium materials make P6 great cordless headphones for sport, library,office hours and travel.Sound cancelling headphone with super soft Over-Ear foam eco-leather earmuffs and headband would provide perfect stable fit and comfort even during long hours of wearing. Portable and Foldable Headphone with carry pouch for daily protection and smooth storage.

【HANDS-FREE CALLS, VOICE ASSISTANT & HUGE BATTERY LIFE】 – Enable Siri/Google Assistant to help you all the time with 1 click while your phone is in the pocket. Take on every journey and spend enjoyable moments with up to 20Hrs Battery life and super quick charging technology. Even without battery, keep the endless audio joy with our audio cable, also compatible with any aircraft. Answer calls both on wireless and wired mode – built-in HD microphone.

【24 MONTH WARRANTY and USA BASED CUSTOMER SERVICE】 – Free 30-Day returns and 24 Months warranty for Manufacturing defects. We from PowerLocus believe strongly that our clients should have only the best, something we will enjoy having ourselves!

Feel their unique sound qualities, so they will become your choice number 1.Yes, our batteries endure longer than the others and we will not let you down during the busy days!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Look great and very comfortable!
reviews.reviewText: I got these as a replacement for my Power Locus 2 headphones. Though these don't have radio, they feel sturdier and I would choose to get these if I had to pick between the two. (At first I was upset that the P6's didn't have a radio function, but then I realized that I never used it on my P2's! Lol.) Anyway, as a general user, I'm very happy :) Pros and cons below.Pros:- Like the title says, they look cute and are comfortable. Especially in comparison to my P2 model, the P6 has thicker cushions and it's honestly nicer to wear them.- Battery life seems sufficient. I haven't timed it, but they have lasted multiple uses between charges.- Can reach low volumes. This is a personal preference, but I have sensitive ears. I've had a few bluetooth headphones and not all of them can go as low as I'd like. I had a pair that would go "BLUETOOTH ON!!!!!" and it was so loud and jarring! Awful. I hated it. So, for anyone else with sensitive hearing, these are free of that problem.- Customer service is *fantastic*! Like I said above, I'd previously had the P2 model. They had started to make a rattling noise, which was minor but annoying and affected my desire to use them. (The P6's feel sturdier and I'm hopeful that I do not have that problem with them.) Customer service stood behind their 12-month warranty and offered to replace the P2's or let me try the new P6. I should probably add that this review is for replacement headphones that were sent to me, but this is still my honest opinion.Cons:- Did not come with a hard case. The P2's came with a hard case as a carrier. This one only had a soft velvet bag. :( Definitely not as protective when traveling.- Noise cancellation is minimal. I think it has better noise-cancelling than the P2's (thicker cushions) but I would never say these block out other sound.I've tried a few bluetooth headphones off of Amazon over the years, and these are so far my favorites. I would recommend if you're looking for a general, comfortable, over-ear pair of headphones!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These earphones are comfortable but if you wear glasses, only thin wired glasses are comfortable.* Anything else kind of digs into your scull above the ear. I have some wire frames, so it works for me. They are nice looking and the sound is good. I use them more for podcasts, so can’t speak to musical quality.I am well satisfied with them, and can recommend them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this product for when I an working outside. Sound quality is good, built well, and a great price. They also hold a charge all day. After having them 1 year I would tell you I would buy them again 👍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: They are light weight so not heavy on your head,adjustable,fit well,, stays put. Could use a little more padding around the top.The Sound is pretty good for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars For the price, I was more than satisfied.
reviews.reviewText: $30 and it lasted me 7 months, considering I was using it near everyday anywhere from 4-10 hours a day. I would say they more than held up. They charge quick, just a few hours can keep them going for multiple days of use. They're comfortable and the padding never felt annoying no matter my hair length. They can fold in for easy transport, have a backup wire just in case they die. As well as being fairly durable, they've been out with me during thunderstorms and come back fine. As well as saved me from bumbing my head more than a few times at work. The only con I can think of is the built in microphone is not the highest quality. Though considering it's an internal microphone it's fair for the price. Mine eventually broke but I attribute this to not only the stress of what I put it through but how I had to wear it for work. With one muff over and ear and the the other behind my ear keeps the plastic sat at a weird angle. Eventually it snapped clean through the outer and inner band. Taking a look inside I can say the actual padding is a mix of a gel outer-layer and the inside has some memory foam too for added cushioning. Overall, you get more than what you pay for and if you only plan to use them casually without a stressful environment. I can see them lasting well over a few years. Worth the buy and the fun color selection makes it even better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Just how I wanted it!!! They are awesome. Great sound!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So comfortable and sound great
reviews.reviewText: These headphones are amazing especially for the price. I was looking for lightweight, comfort and sound quality over the ear headphones and have found them. I can wear these for hours and almost forget that I am wearing them. Sound quality is great (I feel it's comparable with my Beats Solo3). Battery life is great. I use them during the work day and have to charge them about every 2-3 days for about 30 minutes to get full charge back. I haven't been able to test the microphone so I can't provide any feedback but will update if I do. If you need lightweight, comfortable headphones, give these a try.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Fit is way too tight; can't wear for more than about 15 minutes
reviews.reviewText: The headband seems to be designed to fit women or children. It is so tight on my ears that I cannot use the headphones for listening to music or movies on a flight since I can tolerate wearing them for only 15 minutes.The sound quality is fine and the folded size is good, but these features are of little value to me without being able to use them as intended.

I am so happy with these headphones and this company. I wear them all the time for walks and traveling, listening to music podcasts, and movies. They are super comfortable with good sound. The battery lasts a long time on one charge. After a year, I had an issue with the charging port. I sent photos to the company and they sent me a brand new pair, no questions asked! Great customer service and the price is awesome. Very happy with my purchase.
Se escuchan bien, funcionan bien, tienen buen bass... Los pedí color negro,rojo y los mandaron grises... Fue el único detalle...fuera de ahí son unos buenos audífonos la verdad... Para el precio
Appena tolte dall'imballo mi sono subito accorto dell'ottima costruzione e qualità del prodotto. Audio molto buono, quindi rapporto qualità prezzo indiscutibile.

reviews.reviewTitle: Perfectos pero quizás para un rato.
reviews.reviewText: Aspectos positivos:- Estéticamente son muy bonitos.- Perfecta compatibilidad bluetooth, fácilmente reconocible y se conecta muy rápidamente.- Altísima duración de la batería y además se carga muy rápidamente.- Sonido muy bueno. No soy un experto ni tampoco necesito una altísima calidad, pero si quieres escuchar música o una película sin molestar a nadie vas a poder hacerlo totalmente enfrascado con un buen sonido.Aspectos negativos:- En mi caso concreto el pabellón auditivo no queda totalmente integrado en el casco como en otros modelos que he probado. Esto, añadido además a que uso gafas, genera algo de molestia e incomodidad en las orejas cuando pasa algo de tiempo.Si la zona de acople auricular fuera un poco más grande serían perfectos.

reviews.reviewTitle: Erstklassige Kopfhörer die ihren Preis wert sind
reviews.reviewText: Erstklassig im Hörvergnügen, halten Nebengeräusche sehr gut ab, Bluetooth ist erstklassig und die Telefonfunkrion ist auch super.Der Preis ist super, da die Qualität des Kopfhörer auf hohem Niveau ist.
